channel.title: Geronimo Jack's Beard
channel.itunes:author: Jorge and Sidekick22
channel.itunes:subtitle: A Lost Podcast
channel.itunes:summary: Jorge and Sidekick22 talk about LOST from the Island.

item.title: GJB Podcast Archive
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description:

item.title: A Couple of Things...
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description:
The theme song that we used in the final podcast was sent to us by Taylor Morden. Thanks, Taylor!

Also, once we get moved in and settled at our new house we'll pull the scripts out of storage and give a firm answer to the outrigger question. Sorry for answering it but then not really answering it! Didn't mean to frustrate you guys!

item.title: The Last GJB
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description:
Here it is, folks. The Last GJB.

Listen here: The Last GJB


In our last romp in the GJB hay, we discuss our last few months after leaving Hawaii, answer some listener emails, answer some questions that we couldn't before about the show, and we also added some bits from the cutting room floor. We hope you enjoy.

Thanks for being such great and loyal fans!



Missing LOST,


Beth and Jorge

item.title: Long time no Hear
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description:
Hey everyone. It's been a long while since we last posted. A lot has changed in the past two months and we're still adjusting but we've begun working on the final GJB podcast.

We are currently planning to post it on August 24th, the same day you can grab your LOST dvds!

We hope all of you guys are well!

Beth and Jorge :)

item.title: One more shot from the last day
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description: That orange bulge coming from Michaels pants is actually his safety harness. He'd hook it on through his zipper.

item.title: Rough Video of the Helicopter
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description:
Coming up the hill in Kualoa was shot by a helicopter.
Here's a video of the rehearsal.

It's shot by Jennings Fowler on his phone so the quality is rough.
Jennings was one of our prop guys. You see him at the end after Josh.
By the way, Jennings played the cab driver who let's Locke out of the cab at the church in the finale.
You may also remember him as the guy who gave Terry the dollar he threw a knife at in one of the DVD bonus features from a while back.

item.title: Episode #617/618 The End
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description:
The End is here.


We recorded this podcast today, May 25, 2010.


Listen here: 617/618 The End


Here are some pics from the set:


The heart of the island light/waterfall/cave






The interior of the Ajira plane.


The interior of the cave


And the fake baby that was used as "Aaron" in the church scene. Ken shared his smoke with it.

item.title: Still a Candidate!
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description:
Jorge said I was crossed off, but I knew I wasn't. Thanks, Mark ;)




Totally still a candidate,

Sidekick22

item.title: HIC visits GJB
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description: Beth wanted to keep the special guest a secret until you heard it. So we held off on posting this pic for a moment.

item.title: Shiner
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description:
Here's a pic of the shiner Ian accidentally gave Emerson, two days after it happened. It happened early in on in filming the episode and you can see it throughout both the off and on island scenes.




Also, a pic from the studio of the well that Locke threw Desmond into:

item.title: Episode #616 What They Died For
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description:
Hi, folks. Unfortunately due to the fact that Jorge is in New York and Sidekick22 is in Hawaii, we are unable to give you the "Listener Emails" and "Recap" portions of this podcast.



But, to make up for it, we gave you a special guest!


We recorded this podcast on March 26, 2010.


Listen here: 616 What They Died For

Some notes about this podcast:

  • The scene with Claire and Locke in the beginning was edited out for time's sake

  • They didn't focus on Jack picking up the cup at the beach at all

item.title: Episode #615 Across the Sea
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description:
It's the birth of the Smoke Monster!!!!


We recorded this podcast on March 11, 2010.


Listen here: 615 Across the Sea


Here's Sidekick22 with the fake baby's umbilical cord. Check out that dude's shiny jacket in the background.





And Jorge with Alison.


And Leila.

item.title: Allow me to blow your mind
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)

item.title: The "Sub"
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description:
Here are a couple of pics from a part of the "submarine". The wooden part sticking out on the left side in this pic is where the ladder was to come out...


...seen here as Sidekick22 escapes Widmore!

item.title: Ajira Plane Scene Video
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description:
Sorry for it being so small! (That's what she said.)

This is the scene where Claire runs up to Locke as they all leave the Ajira plane, and she talks to him for a moment and then the camera moves back to the end of the line of people to catch Jack and Sawyer's conversation.


The cast needed to make sure they were out of the way of the camera's movement.

item.title: Episode #614 The Candidate
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description:
Man, that was a lot of death. Poor Sayid, Sun, Jin and Lapidus :(


Some notes:
  • The opening scene that we discussed regarding Jack's foot was actually edited at the end of the last episode.
  • We've been told that the Dinner Impossible episode is scheduled to air on May 19th

We recorded this podcast on February 19, 2010.


Listen here: 614 The Candidate


Here are some pics from the sets of episode 614:

item.title: Foxy and I headed to do boat work on the Elizabeth
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)

item.title: Episode #613 The Last Recruit
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description:
We've got a short one for you guys this week because we had to do quite a bit of editing after watching the episode.


Just four episodes left. Only two more days of filming. It's been sort of a melancholy week.


We recorded this podcast on February 16, 2010.

Listen here: 613 The Last Recruit


(By the way, "Burditt" is the guy who said "Hands up!" to Zoe when she approached Locke.)

item.title: Thar she blows!!!
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description:
Here's a behind the scenes vid of the Black Rock gettin' it in the end.


More importantly to note, check out how Archie "Grandpa Tito" Ahuna doesn't even flinch.
Not for a second. He is more man than I will ever be.

-J

item.title: By the way...
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description: This really is me as a baby.

item.title: Episode #612 Everybody Loves Hugo
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description:
Holy explosion! What an episode. An explosive kiss and an explosive Ilana :(


And our little Nunu got to show off her ears! Did you see her? If not, here's a screencap:




We recorded this podcast on February 15, 2010.


Listen here: 612 Everybody Loves Hugo


Here are some pics from the set of Jorge with Cynthia:



And Jorge with Ian:

item.title: SPOILER ALERT: "Everybody Loves Hugo" Special Guest Star!!!
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description: Keep an eye out on Tuesday night's epi for a special appearance by someone close to the GJB family. I'll give you a hint.

item.title: Episode #611 Happily Ever After
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description:
Hi everyone! This is the first podcast that we recorded after finally posting the first one back in February. That was the point that keeping track of everything that we had recorded, read, and watched got really confusing. Hope this all makes sense!


We recorded this podcast on February 10, 2010.


Listen here: 611 Happily Ever After


And now, a tribute to Eloise's fabulous hair!

item.title: Episode #610 The Package
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description:
This may just be the grossest GJB podcast that we've done thus far. Sorry.


We recorded it over Christmas in Milwaukee and the cold weather got the best of us. Jorge was pretty sick during it. Two days later Sidekick22 was in the emergency room with a 104 fever and an ear infection. Our sincerest apologies for Jorge's constant sniffling (among other things) and the overall stuffiness of this episode.


We recorded this podcast on December 26, 2009.


Listen here: 610 The Package


Here are some pics from our Milwaukee Christmas.


Jorge had never made a snowman but decided that his first snow sculpture would be a snowbear.




Sidekick22 and Brother22 at Candy Cane Lane!


Sidekick22 miserable in the hospital.





Sidekick22 became the sheriff of the entire state of Wisconsin.



Jorge contemplating the hill.



The secret passageway to the Safehouse!



Jorge loved scraping the windows of the car.

item.title: From Ab Etc.
item.author: geronimojacksbeard@yahoo.com (Jorge and Sidekick22)
item.description:
Here's a shot of me with Mirelly and Nestor from the day we shot that scene at the big tree.
Wanted to get it in under the wire before we were on to the next episode.
